sourcesContent:
import "../styles/App.scss"; import contactList from "../data/contacts.json"; import { useState } from "react"; function App() { const [data, setData] = useState(contactList); const [search, setSearch] = useState(""); const handleSearch = (ev) => { setSearch(ev.target.value); }; const htmlData = data .filter( (oneContact) => oneContact.name.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase()) || oneContact.lastname.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase()) ) .map((contact, index) => (

  • {contact.name} {contact.lastname}

    {contact.phone}

    {contact.email}

    • )); return (
    {/* header */}

    Mi agenda de contactos

    {/* contact list */}
      {htmlData}
    {/* new contact */}

    Añade un nuevo contacto

    ); } export default App;
